skills.description: HTML defines the most basic structures of the web - It is the building blocks of most websites.
CSS takes HTML information and stylizes it using a range of colours, fonts, and animations.
JS is a scripting language that enables fluidity, dynamic content, and complex interactions.
Python is a versatile tool in data management and automation.
Flask allows a webpage to interact with Python libraries.
MySQL is a database management system useful for easily storing and access a variety of information.
